document_title: Genital herpes: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis, prevention
subsection_content:
Measures to prevent genital herpes infection
Sexually active adults can reduce their risk of genital herpes infection by:
Use protection methods when having sex such as condoms and dental dams.; Do not have sex with someone who has herpes symptoms. However, HSV is still transmitted even when there are no symptoms.; Limit the number of sexual partners, be faithful to your partner and ask them to do the same.
